CustomField.description: If this flag is checked, then all of the Assignment's child Timecard Splits and Expenses will be created with their Exclude from Billing flag checked, which would make them *not* eligible for Billing Generation. This can be overridden at the child level.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this flag is checked, then all of the Assignment's child Timecard Splits and Expenses will be created with their Exclude from Billing flag checked, which would make them *not* eligible for Billing Generation. This can be overridden at the child level.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Billing
